Articles.Content: Hello fellow kerbonauhts... Today I used the ribbon generator,but I can't post it in the signiture. Help.

Can you put anything in your signature? If not, it's probably a post count issue.

You should be able to click the Settings button at the top, then Edit Signature on the left side and enter it.
Indeed, I didn't get the option to have a signature for about a week, don't know if this was time based, post based or admin acceptance based. Just keep looking, it'll show up
Already have it. When I put it in the place where you paste the ribbin it says invalid file. I even deleted the http.www. part of it too.

How exactly are you doing your ribbon image, as an image file or as a link to the ribbon generator website? If its a link, it should look like "http://ribbons.cgagnier.ca/image.php?ribbon=xxxx" in your signature line, where xxxx is a specific number.

Images on the forums have been wonky since the Great Coffee Spill; that may be an issue of where your image was being hosted, if you were going that route.

Remove the link from the box for upload signature picture, and instead paste it into the main text box with image tags, eg.

{URL="http://ribbons.cgagnier.ca/redir.php"}{img}Your image link here{/img}{/URL}

replacing {} with []
Alternatively, if you link directly to an image (an HTTP link that end in .jpg or .png) you can just do
